choiceOption.name: irqHandlingMethod
choiceOption.description: Method used to install interrupt handler in vector table
choiceOption.toolTip: This selection allow the interrupt handler for this peripheral to be installed using several different methods

stringOption.name: namedInterruptHandler
stringOption.toolTip: This is the name of a function to be installed in the vector table as the interrupt handler for this peripheral

binaryOption.name: irqHandlerInstalled
binaryOption.toolTip: If enabled ths option allows the handling of interrupts using two methods\n - override static method irqHandler() of the class, or\n - use of the setCallback() method to install a handler

choice.name: Handler installed (Use setCallback() or class method)

fragment.template:
//! Callback handler has been installed in vector table
 	static constexpr bool irqHandlerInstalled = $(irqHandlerInstalled);

intOption.name: irqLevel
intOption.toolTip: Sets the priority level used to configure the NVIC

fragment.template:
//! Default IRQ level
 	static constexpr uint32_t irqLevel = $(irqLevel);
